Ar0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Those pickys over there
seem to be about your
speed.
Ar0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Those pickys over there
seem to be about your
speed.

A70BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Peco Pecos are fascinating.
I am still doing my, uh, research...
But now it is of a different nature.
A70BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Peco Pecos are fascinating.
I am still doing my, uh, research...
But now it is of a different nature.

BL0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
You see I've been uh, ''researching''
these animals by collecting their
Bill of Birds but lately they seem
to have become hostile towards me.
BL0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
You see I've been uh, ''researching''
these animals by collecting their
Bill of Birds but lately they seem
to have become hostile towards me.

Bb0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Can you do me a favor please?
Bb0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Can you do me a favor please?

CL0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
I am so afraid that these Peco Pecos will hurt me for my, uh, researching activities.
CL0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
I am so afraid that these Peco Pecos will hurt me for my, uh, researching activities.

Cb0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Can you help protect me by killing them?
I think I'll feel safer.
Please....
Cb0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Can you help protect me by killing them?
I think I'll feel safer.
Please....

DL0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Thank you so much!
How many would you like to hunt?
DL0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Thank you so much!
How many would you like to hunt?

EL0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Come back when you've finished your task and I will give you a small reward.
EL0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Come back when you've finished your task and I will give you a small reward.

Eb0BBQ.en:
[Gregor]
Please reconsider.
I may have gone too far with my research.
I don't like how they seem to be flocking towards me.
Eb0BBQ.pt:
[Gregor]
Please reconsider.
I may have gone too far with my research.

Er0BBQ.en:
